term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - thermal conductivity detector, in gas chromatography
term.title: thermal conductivity detector

item.text: In general, two cells arranged in a bridge configuration detect the change in thermal conductivity of the gas at the output of the column. This detector is sensitive to any substance with thermal conductivity different from that of the carrier gas. The lowest detectable limit is between 0.5 and 100 ppmv. The linear dynamic range is of the order of 10E3. This type of detector is often used for measuring components at relatively high concentrations.
